StringList.Name: Additional Include Directories
StringList.Description: Specifies one or more directories to add to the include path; use semi-colon delimited list if more than one. (/I[path])

StringList.Name: Resolve #using References
StringList.Description: Specifies one or more directories (separate directory names with a semicolon) to be searched to resolve names passed to a #using directive. (/AI[path])

Integer.Name: Debug Information Format
Integer.Description: Specifies the type of debugging information generated by the compiler. You must also change linker settings appropriately to match. (/Z7, Zd, /Zi, /ZI)

Value.ValueText: Program Database For Edit And Continue (/ZI)

Integer.Name: Common Language RunTime Support
Integer.Description: Specifies the type of debugging information generated by the compiler. You must also change linker settings appropriately to match. (/Z7, Zd, /Zi, /ZI)

Value.ValueText: Pure MSIL Common Language RunTime Support (/clr:pure)
Safe MSIL Common Language RunTime Support (/clr:safe)
Common Language RunTime Support, Old Syntax (/clr:oldSyntax)

Boolean.Name: Suppress Startup Banner
Boolean.Description: Suppress the display of the startup banner and information messages. (/nologo)

Integer.Name: Warning Level
Integer.Description: Select how strict you want the compiler to be about checking for potentially suspect constructs. (/W0 - /W4)

Boolean.Name: Threat Warnings as Errors
Boolean.Description: Enables the compiler to treat all warnings as errors. (/WX)

Boolean.Name: Multi-processor Compilation
Boolean.Description: Enables the compiler to treat all warnings as errors. (/WX)

Boolean.Name: Use Unicode For Assembler Listing
Boolean.Description: Causes the output file to be created in UTF-8 format.

Integer.Name: Optimization
Integer.Description: Select option for code optimization; choose Custom to use specific optimization options. (/Od, /O1, /O2 /O3, /Ox)

Integer.Name: Inline Function Expansion
Integer.Description: Select option for code optimization; choose Custom to use specific optimization options. (/Od, /O1, /O2 /O3, /Ox)

Boolean.Name: Enable Intrinsic Functions
Boolean.Description: Enables instrinsic functions. Using instrinsic functions generates faster, but possibly larger, code. (/Oi)

Integer.Name: Favor Size Or Speed
Integer.Description: Choose whether to favor code size or code speed; 'Global Optimization' must be turned on. (/Ot, /Os)

Boolean.Name: Omit Frame Pointers
Boolean.Description: Suppresses frame pointers. (/Oy)

Boolean.Name: Enable FiberSafe Optimizations
Boolean.Description: Enables memory space optimization when using fibers and thread local storage access. (/GT)

Boolean.Name: Whole Program Optimization
Boolean.Description: Enables cross-module optimizations by delaying code generation to link time; requires that linker option 'Link Time Code Generation' be turned on. (/GL)

StringList.Name: Preprocessor Definitions
StringList.Description: Specifies one or more preprocessor defines.

StringList.Name: Undefine Preprocessor Definitions
StringList.Description: Specifies one or more preprocessor undefines. (/U[macro])

Boolean.Name: Undefine All Preprocessor Definitions
Boolean.Description: Undefine all previously defined preprocessor values. (/u)

Boolean.Name: Ignore Standard Include Path
Boolean.Description: Prevents the compiler from searching for include files in directories specified in the INCLUDE environment variables.

Boolean.Name: Preprocess To File
Boolean.Description: Preprocesses C and C++ source files and writes the preprocessed output to a file. This option suppresses compilation, thus it does not produce an .obj file.

Boolean.Name: Preprocess Suppress Line Numbers
Boolean.Description: Preprocess without #line directives.

Boolean.Name: Keep Comments
Boolean.Description: Suppresses comment strip from source code; requires that one of the 'Preprocessing' options be set. (/C)

Boolean.Name: Enable String Pool
Boolean.Description: Enables the compiler to create a single read-only copy of identical strings in the program image and in memory during execution, resulting in smaller programs, an optimization called string pooling. /O1, /O2, and /ZI automatically set /GF option.

Boolean.Name: Enable Minimal Rebuild
Boolean.Description: Detect changes to C++ class definitions and recompile only affected source files. (/Gm)

Integer.Name: Enable C++ Exceptions
Integer.Description: Specifies the model of exception handling to be used by the compiler.

Boolean.Name: Smaller Type Check
Boolean.Description: Enables checking for conversion to smaller types, incompatible with any optimization type other than debug. (/RTCc)

Integer.Name: Basic Runtime Checks
Integer.Description: Perform basic runtime error checks, incompatible with any optimization type other than debug. (/RTCs. /RTCu, /RTC1)

Integer.Name: Struct Member Alignment
Integer.Description: Specify 1, 2, 4, 8, or 16-byte boundaries for struct member alignment. (/Zp[num])

Boolean.Name: Buffer Security Check
Boolean.Description: Check for buffer overruns; useful for closing hackable loopholes on internet servers. The default is enabled. (/GS-)

Boolean.Name: Enable Function-Level Linking
Boolean.Description: Enables function-level linking; required for Edit and Continue to work. (/Gy)

Integer.Name: Enable Enhanced Instruction Set
Integer.Description: Enable use of instructions found on processors that support enhanced instruction sets, e.g., the SSE and SSE2 enhancements to the IA-32. Currently only available when building for the x86 architecture. (/arch:SSE, /arch:SSE2)

Boolean.Name: Enable Floating Point Exceptions
Boolean.Description: Enables floating point exceptions when generating code. (/fp:except)

Boolean.Name: Create Hotpatchable Image
Boolean.Description: When hotpatching is on, the compiler ensures that first instruction of each function is two bytes, which is required got hot patching. (/hotpatch)

Boolean.Name: Disable Language Extensions
Boolean.Description: Suppresses or enables language extensions.

Boolean.Name: Treat WChar_t As Built In Type
Boolean.Description: When specified, the type wchar_t becomes a native type that maps to _wchar_t in the same way that short maps to _int16. /Zc:wchar_t is on by default.

Boolean.Name: Force Conformance In For Loop Scope
Boolean.Description: Forces the compiler to conform to the local scope in a for loop.

Boolean.Name: Enable Run-Time Type Information
Boolean.Description: Adds code for checking C++ object types at run time (runtime type information).

Boolean.Name: OpenMP Support
Boolean.Description: Enables OpenMP 2.0 language extensions. (/openmp)

Integer.Name: Precompiled Header
Integer.Description: Create/Use Precompiled Header: Enables creation or use of a precompiled header during the build.

String.Name: Precompiled Header File
String.Description: Specifies header file name to use when creating or using a precompiled header file. (/Yc[name], /Yu[name])

String.Name: Precompiled Header Output File
String.Description: Specifies the path and/or name of the generated precompiled header file. (/Fp[name])

Boolean.Name: Expand Attributed Source
Boolean.Description: Create listing file with expanded attributes injected into source file.

Integer.Name: Assembler Output
Integer.Description: Specifies the contents of assembly language output file.

String.Name: ASM List Location
String.Description: Specifies relative path and/or name for ASM listing file; can be file or directory name.

String.Name: Object File Name
String.Description: Specifies a name to override the default object file name; can be file or directory name.

String.Name: Program Data Base File Name
String.Description: Specifies a name for a compiler-generated PDB file; also specifies base name for the required compiler-generated IDB file; can be file or directory name.

Boolean.Name: Generate XML Documentation Files
Boolean.Description: Specifies that the compiler should generate XML documentation comment file (.XDC).

String.Name: XML Documentation File Name
String.Description: Specifies the name of the generated XML documentation files; can be file or directory name.

Boolean.Name: Enable Browse Information
Boolean.Description: Specifies level of Browse information in .bsc file. (/FR)

String.Name: Browse Information File
String.Description: Specifies optional name for browser information file. (/FR[name])

Integer.Name: Calling Convention
Integer.Description: Select the default calling convention for your application (can be overridden by function).

Integer.Name: Compile As
Integer.Description: Select compile language option for .c and .cpp files.

StringList.Name: Disable Specific Warnings
StringList.Description: Disable the desired warning numbers; put numbers in a semi-colon delimited list.

StringList.Name: Forced Include File
StringList.Description: Specifies one or more forced include files.

StringList.Name: Force #using File
StringList.Description: Specifies one or more forced #using files.

Boolean.Name: Show Includes
Boolean.Description: Generate a list of include files with compile output.

Boolean.Name: Use Full Paths
Boolean.Description: Use full paths in diagnostic messages.

Boolean.Name: Omit Default Library Names
Boolean.Description: Do not include default library names in .obj files.

Integer.Name: Internal Compiler Error Reporting
Integer.Description: Specifies how internal tool errors should be reported back to Microsoft. The default in the IDE is prompt. The default from command line builds is queue.

StringList.Name: Treat Specific Warnings As Errors
StringList.Description: Treats the specific compiler warning as an error where n is a compiler warning.
